articles.title: New Zealand designates American Proud Boys and The Base terrorist organisations - RNZ
articles.description: The Proud Boys and The Base meet the definition of terrorist entities, and the move will mean funding, supporting or organising with them will be illegal, Andrew Coster says.
articles.content:
New Zealand has designated US groups the Proud Boys and The Base as terrorist entities.

articles.title: New Chelsea owner Todd Boehly may want to trade players, but here's why it doesn't happen in soccer - ESPN
articles.description: Trading players in the MLB, NBA and other American sports is commonplace. But new Chelsea owner Todd Boehly won't be able to conduct transfer business in the same way.
articles.content:
